participant_1.background:
I am proud of my two dogs and the love they bring to my life.
i love to sew.
My pets are a good way to keep my mind off of my divorce.
I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday.
i help around with bookkeeping and tours.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my long curly hair, and the fact that I own a home.
I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older.
I play the piano because it allows me to express myself creatively and connect with others.
my sister is a published author.
my favorite color is black.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to today?
Hi! I'm just chilling at home. I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older.
Oh, that's great! I know what you mean. I'm looking forward to having more time to read and sew.
That sounds fun! I love to read and play the piano.
My sister is actually a published author. What kind of music do you like to play?
I love to play classical music. I find it very relaxing.
That's awesome! I love classical music too.
I love Jane Austen and Charles Dickens.
I love Jane Austen too! She's so funny.
I know, right? She's one of my favorite authors.
What's your favorite book by her?
Pride and Prejudice is my favorite.
That's a great choice! I love that book too.
I know, right? It's one of my favorite books of all time
